articles.title: Four mild symptoms of COVID to spot - they could be the first sign you're falling ill - Express
articles.description: COVID-19 symptoms have been shown to manifest themselves in different ways. While a high temperature, new, continuous cough and a loss or change to sense of smell or taste are recognised as the main symptoms, other signs have also been identified.
articles.content:
